ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] (OT) Squad Ring Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: It always just takes one person to spoil a good time. : ) Kimes, Dean W.  on 05/30/2001 11:40:09 AM Please respond to
ygData.messageBody:
It always just takes one person to spoil a good time. : )




"Kimes, Dean W." <dean_kimes@...> on 05/30/2001 11:40:09 AM

Please respond to eqbards@yahoogroups.com

To: "'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'" <eqbards@yahoogroups.com>
cc:
Subject: RE: [eqbards] (OT) Squad Ring Quest


That's why the payment for JumJum damages quest guy was changed to be a
deputy in Misty Thicket long ago. Someone on this list at the time trained
the original target right over next to the quest giver in Rivervale and
stood there just hailing the two and doing the quest thousands of times.
Some Guide saw what was happening and they fixed that the very next patch.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Cyr, Thierry [mailto:thierry.cyr@...]
Sent: Wednesday, 30 May, 2001 9:33 AM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] (OT) Squad Ring Quest


ssshh, although that's being creative with game mechanics, some powers that
be would call that exploiting 8)

a little creativity never hurt anyone though

-----Original Message-----
From: Nygaardr, FC3 [mailto:nygaardr@...]
Sent: May 30, 2001 3:15 PM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] (OT) Squad Ring Quest


There is another faction type quest and you dont have to zone, taking some
soup up to near the marshal but I forget both party's in the quest. It is
a
very very short run though sometimes you can run fast enough the door on
the bank doesnt close before you have another bowl of soup. Although I did
train the girl a little closer to the bank door before I started doing the
quest.


Mu

-----Original Message-----
From: Stephen McCloskey [mailto:s.mccloskey@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 30, 2001 10:13 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] (OT) Squad Ring Quest


Last I checked that quest, the NPC will only give the turnips to low level
characters. Do it early if you want the faction from it.

>actually, there's a quest you can do really quick with selo's or sow in
>rivervale (no zoning), the turnip delivery quest, I got a druid to 11
doing
>it on test server once, he was very very warmly when i stopped doing it.
>
>
>You have to get ungodly good faction with GuardiansoftheVale, which you
can

>gain by killing Goblins, Mooto and Deathfist Orcs; and by turning belts in
>to Deputy Budo, and goblin warbeads in to Sheriff Roglio. My Halfling
